titleStmt.title: A declaration of the Northern Army under the command of Major General Lambert, as it was sent unto the well-affected ministry, and people of the Kingdom of Scotland; shewing their willingness to hazard their lives for the peace and welfare of both kingdoms (in opposing theirs and the kingdoms enemies) for procuring their peace, notwithstanding themselves, at last, be denied to have any benefit thereby.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
